item.title: About
item.description:
Stumbling through the tidyverse with stars in our eyes

Across The Tidyverse is a blog that aims to demonstrate the application of tidyverse packages and functions in the wild.

It is run and maintained by Andrew MacDonald, Miles McBain, MaÃ«lle Salmon, and Nicholas Tierney.
